name: server

scripts.build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ../server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix ../client && npm run build --prefix ../client && npm run start --prefix ../server

author: dev by sanket Arjun Pujari - 7378768735
description: In addition to our academic programs, we offer a variety of extracurricular activities and resources to enhance the student experience. From clubs and organizations to research opportunities and internships, our students have the chance to engage in meaningful experiences outside of the classroom.
